blog.name: jaggednes
blog.title: Maybe art?
blog.description:
Jay (they/them)

Furry artist™

So multifandom that it actually pains me (i.e. Doctor Who, Marvel, Venom, Torchwood, Class, RC:9GN, etc.)

My blog's a mess-- just like me

tags: loki isn't dead i won't allow it
marvel why have you done this
summary:
Me: I think I've accepted Loki's death in the MCU and I can't fully believe that he'll come back in A4
Also me after scrolling...
body:
Me: I think I’ve accepted Loki’s death in the MCU and I can’t fully believe that he’ll come back in A4

Also me after scrolling through Instagram Loki posts: buT LOOK AT ALL THE EVIDENCE THAT HE’S ALIVE!! He can’t be dead I won’t allow it. Let’s think up millions of theories why/how he’s still alive and kicking even if my heart will break once A4 comes out

summary: Summoning Demons So, I finished him up. Didn’t really intend for him to be a tribute to Steve Ditko, but I guess he is now  :( ...
caption:
Summoning Demons

So, I finished him up. Didn’t really intend for him to be a tribute to Steve Ditko, but I guess he is now  :(  My daughter pointed out that I forgot the scars on his hands. She helped me add them (and gave me a ton of critique on the colors!)

blog.name: itsanerdlife
blog.title: Ama
blog.description: 20's II Married. || Hufflepuff. II Kingsman - Marvel Fanfic Writer. II Beta Reader// Editor // Partner @Mo320 II Master List

summary: Bad Decisions 14
title: Bad Decisions 14
body:
Pairing: Rock Star! Peter Parker x Tony Stark’s Daughter! Reader

Warning: Swearing, bad behavior, rivals, secrets, lies, sneaking around, mentions of loss, fights, mean things said, and arrogant assholes.

A/N: Reader is Tony Stark’s daughter. Tony is a single father, who is also a Rock Star, who has a strict set of rules for his one and only daughter.

Tag List Is Open!!

The four of you arrived at the next stop, just in time for rehearsals to start. You saw your father taking the stage, your uncles with him. Pepper left to join them, Wanda went to find her father, and Luke followed you like a massive shadow. You slowly wandered around backstage.

“What is your job exactly?” You pause looking up at Luke.

“To take care of you.” He smiles. You smile back, it was hard not to. But you didn’t know if you could depend on Luke, you’d once believed you could depend on Peter, and you learned a lesson the hard way. You could only depend on yourself. Tony washed his hands of you once after you first met Peter, he would do it again if he found out about your marriage, about your hospital stay. You just couldn’t risk it.

“So, you’ll follow me around and rub my shoulder at night?” You smirk at him. Luke laughs, and it makes you smile, he was calming to be around.

“My only specialties.” He nodded. You shrug your good shoulder.

“A girl can dream.” You sigh. You turn the corner and realized you were in dressing room hall, you needed to turn around quickly. But not quick enough, a door opens and Peter steps out.

“Darlin.” His voice was shocked. He was suddenly standing in front of you instantly. His fingers brushed your hair back, his eyes searching your face. “How are you feeling?” He asks. “Your shoulder? You need anything?” He asks. His concern rocked your core, and you were lost in his dark eyes, swallowing you. You itched to reach up and run your fingers through his messy hair. You wanted to confess everything, what you heard in Spain, about the revenge and money. You wanted to beg him to tell you it wasn’t true.

“Careful, she’s still tender.” Luke steps up, his eyes on Peter’s hand near your shoulder. Peter’s eyes snap up, away from your face.

“Who in the fuck are you?” He asks.

“Luke.” He puts his hand out. You flick Peter in the neck as his jaw tightens. He shakes Luke’s hand like it was torture.

“Dad hired him. He my care giver thing and my security detail.” You explain.

“Well Nurse.” Peter smirks. You sigh, flicking him again, he winces, glaring at you. “I need a minute, to have a word with my wife.” Peter looks to Luke. You wince, how could he be so careless with that word. You look around the hall, thank god you seemed to be alone. You turn looking at Luke.

“He’s kidding.” You swat Peter. “Tell him.” You glare.

“Yeah, I’m hilarious.” Peter rolls his eyes. “We’ll be right back.” He took your good hand and pulled you through one of the doors.

“I’ll wait here.” Luke nods and with that the door slammed shut behind you. Once again you and Peter were in a dressing room alone. This was never going to be a good thing. Peter’s hand cupped the back of your neck as he moved close to you.

“Are you okay?” He asks. That depends emotionally or physically?

“I’m okay.” You nod.

“When you didn’t come back with Tony, I thought you bailed again.” He sighs.

“You shouldn’t have told Luke, I’m your wife.” You sigh looking at his chest.

“But you are.” He replies. You close your eyes, you couldn’t even force yourself to say the words, they hurt too much. You didn’t want to be his wife anymore. You didn’t have to like it, but you knew he wasn’t in this for the same reasons as you. “I don’t like your nurse.” He runs a knuckle down your cheek.

“He makes my shoulder feel better, and he’s nice.” You admit.

“I can make you feel better, Darlin.” He kissed you softly. Why were you so fucking weak to Peter.

“It doesn’t work like that.” You gasp pulling back.

“Why not?” He searches your face.

“He’s not just my nurse. He’s my security. He’ll protect me.” You reply.

“I’ll protect you. Give him the boot.” Peter smirks.

“Christ, were you born this arrogant or am I just fucking lucky?” You step back.

“You just sort of bring it out in me.” He shrugs. He pulls you back, kissing you deeply. It was sweet, soft and tender like he could heal you with just a kiss. “I want you to come stay on the bus with me. We can work this shit out between us.” His words brush your lips.

Your brain slipped into overdrive, pleading with him to take care of you, to make it all better, to take care of you liked you always wanted.

“Where’s Peter?” Buck gruffed from the hall.

“Shit. I got to go.” Peter kissed you softly. You needed to set this right before he left.

“Peter, we can’t. We can’t fix this. I need you to sign the papers.” You reply in a breathy tone.

“Fucking Christ, Y/N I hear you bring up divorce papers, one more-”

“Peter!” Buck calls he was closer now.

“Sign them, please. They’re fair, you get half my trust and half of anything I inherit when Tony dies.” Your arm wraps around you, this was killing you. “You just have to sign the NDA, you can’t bring up the marriage or anything to do with me.” You press your lips together.

“Are you fucking kidding me?” Peter scuffs stepping away from you, the look of hurt on his face made you look away, tears filled your eyes. “You think you can throw money at me and everything will be forgot?” His tone offended.

You couldn’t answer the tears were rolling down your face. He didn’t just want the money he wanted to fuck your dad over. You were just his pawn. You wouldn’t let him get his revenge on your father, no he could hurt you all he wanted, but your dad was off limits. Peter turned his hand on the door when he looked back.

“Buck was right, you are a cold, heartless bitch.” He shakes his head, ripping the door open, he storms out letting the door slam shut behind him. You stood in place, crying quietly to yourself.

“Buck was right, you are a cold, heartless bitch.” He shakes his head, ripping the door open, he storms out letting the door slam shut behind him. You stood in place, crying quietly to yourself.

trail.content:
Pairing: Rock Star! Peter Parker x Tony Stark’s Daughter! Reader

Warning: Swearing, bad behavior, rivals, secrets, lies, sneaking around, mentions of loss, fights, mean things said, and arrogant assholes.

A/N: Reader is Tony Stark’s daughter. Tony is a single father, who is also a Rock Star, who has a strict set of rules for his one and only daughter.

Tag List Is Open!!

The four of you arrived at the next stop, just in time for rehearsals to start. You saw your father taking the stage, your uncles with him. Pepper left to join them, Wanda went to find her father, and Luke followed you like a massive shadow. You slowly wandered around backstage.

“What is your job exactly?” You pause looking up at Luke.

“To take care of you.” He smiles. You smile back, it was hard not to. But you didn’t know if you could depend on Luke, you’d once believed you could depend on Peter, and you learned a lesson the hard way. You could only depend on yourself. Tony washed his hands of you once after you first met Peter, he would do it again if he found out about your marriage, about your hospital stay. You just couldn’t risk it.

“So, you’ll follow me around and rub my shoulder at night?” You smirk at him. Luke laughs, and it makes you smile, he was calming to be around.

“My only specialties.” He nodded. You shrug your good shoulder.

“A girl can dream.” You sigh. You turn the corner and realized you were in dressing room hall, you needed to turn around quickly. But not quick enough, a door opens and Peter steps out.

“Darlin.” His voice was shocked. He was suddenly standing in front of you instantly. His fingers brushed your hair back, his eyes searching your face. “How are you feeling?” He asks. “Your shoulder? You need anything?” He asks. His concern rocked your core, and you were lost in his dark eyes, swallowing you. You itched to reach up and run your fingers through his messy hair. You wanted to confess everything, what you heard in Spain, about the revenge and money. You wanted to beg him to tell you it wasn’t true.

“Careful, she’s still tender.” Luke steps up, his eyes on Peter’s hand near your shoulder. Peter’s eyes snap up, away from your face.

“Who in the fuck are you?” He asks.

“Luke.” He puts his hand out. You flick Peter in the neck as his jaw tightens. He shakes Luke’s hand like it was torture.

“Dad hired him. He my care giver thing and my security detail.” You explain.

“Well Nurse.” Peter smirks. You sigh, flicking him again, he winces, glaring at you. “I need a minute, to have a word with my wife.” Peter looks to Luke. You wince, how could he be so careless with that word. You look around the hall, thank god you seemed to be alone. You turn looking at Luke.

“He’s kidding.” You swat Peter. “Tell him.” You glare.

“Yeah, I’m hilarious.” Peter rolls his eyes. “We’ll be right back.” He took your good hand and pulled you through one of the doors.

“I’ll wait here.” Luke nods and with that the door slammed shut behind you. Once again you and Peter were in a dressing room alone. This was never going to be a good thing. Peter’s hand cupped the back of your neck as he moved close to you.

“Are you okay?” He asks. That depends emotionally or physically?

“I’m okay.” You nod.

“When you didn’t come back with Tony, I thought you bailed again.” He sighs.

“You shouldn’t have told Luke, I’m your wife.” You sigh looking at his chest.

“But you are.” He replies. You close your eyes, you couldn’t even force yourself to say the words, they hurt too much. You didn’t want to be his wife anymore. You didn’t have to like it, but you knew he wasn’t in this for the same reasons as you. “I don’t like your nurse.” He runs a knuckle down your cheek.

“He makes my shoulder feel better, and he’s nice.” You admit.

“I can make you feel better, Darlin.” He kissed you softly. Why were you so fucking weak to Peter.

“It doesn’t work like that.” You gasp pulling back.

“Why not?” He searches your face.

“He’s not just my nurse. He’s my security. He’ll protect me.” You reply.

“I’ll protect you. Give him the boot.” Peter smirks.

“Christ, were you born this arrogant or am I just fucking lucky?” You step back.

“You just sort of bring it out in me.” He shrugs. He pulls you back, kissing you deeply. It was sweet, soft and tender like he could heal you with just a kiss. “I want you to come stay on the bus with me. We can work this shit out between us.” His words brush your lips.

Your brain slipped into overdrive, pleading with him to take care of you, to make it all better, to take care of you liked you always wanted.

“Where’s Peter?” Buck gruffed from the hall.

“Shit. I got to go.” Peter kissed you softly. You needed to set this right before he left.

“Peter, we can’t. We can’t fix this. I need you to sign the papers.” You reply in a breathy tone.

“Fucking Christ, Y/N I hear you bring up divorce papers, one more-”

“Peter!” Buck calls he was closer now.

“Sign them, please. They’re fair, you get half my trust and half of anything I inherit when Tony dies.” Your arm wraps around you, this was killing you. “You just have to sign the NDA, you can’t bring up the marriage or anything to do with me.” You press your lips together.

“Are you fucking kidding me?” Peter scuffs stepping away from you, the look of hurt on his face made you look away, tears filled your eyes. “You think you can throw money at me and everything will be forgot?” His tone offended.

You couldn’t answer the tears were rolling down your face. He didn’t just want the money he wanted to fuck your dad over. You were just his pawn. You wouldn’t let him get his revenge on your father, no he could hurt you all he wanted, but your dad was off limits. Peter turned his hand on the door when he looked back.

“Buck was right, you are a cold, heartless bitch.” He shakes his head, ripping the door open, he storms out letting the door slam shut behind him. You stood in place, crying quietly to yourself.

summary: I’m going to preface this by saying that while I think the Guardian films are good, I did not enjoy them as much as everyone...
body:
I’m going to preface this by saying that while I think the Guardian films are good, I did not enjoy them as much as everyone else seemed to. I didn’t like any of the characters a huge amount and felt like a lot of the jokes fell a little flat for me. This isn’t me defending the director of my favorite films or anything. But I do not think that James Gunn should have been fired.

When I saw the headline “James Gunn fired over offensive rape and pedophilia tweets” I though that it was a shame that another good filmmaker turned out to be an asshole but yeah, absolutely he should be fired. But then I read the article and learnt that they weren’t recent tweets and saw this apology:

I’ve not seen any of Gunn’s body of work other than GotG/GotG.v2 to compare, but I don’t remember thinking that anything in the Guardians films (except for maybe that i-forgot-you-were-here joke from the start of the first film) was offensive. I do think that his worldview has changed and that he’s not just trying to save face.

Now I do not believe that joking about pedophilia or rape is acceptable. At all. I am not condoning or defending those tweets. But I do not think that he should be fired for something that he said eight years ago, especially if those words do not represent his views now. We’ve all said things or held beliefs in the past that we regret and would disagree with today. That’s how personal growth works. People shouldn’t be judged by something they said or thought years ago, or else there’s no point in growing and improving as a person.

Had the story been that he had abused someone, I would feel differently. Actions speak louder than words and all that. But to the best of my knowledge he hasn’t (and if he has please let me know). I just don’t think that personal growth is something to be ignored.

MARVEL TWO-IN-ONE #8

NEXT OF KIN CONTINUES!
A new life in a new town on a strange world. Everything has changed for the broken people once known as BEN GRIMM and JOHNNY STORM. But can they repair things before one of their oldest villains puts the nail in the coffin of THE FANTASTIC FOUR?

summary: @nerdramblings101 replied to your post  “I get that Tandy and Tyrone are slow burn but Tandy’s REALLY gonna get...” Just because...
body:
@nerdramblings101 replied to your post “I get that Tandy and Tyrone are slow burn but Tandy’s REALLY gonna get…”
Just because they’re kissing doesn’t mean they’re getting back together. Even if they are, there doesn’t seem like there’s anything wrong with Liam.

Fair enough but I do have some problems with Liam

1) How old is he??? He looks like he’s in his 20s so why is he into a 16/17 year old girl??
2) On top of that, why is he picturing a FUTURE with a 16/17 year old girl if he is in his 20s

3) His love for Tandy seems to be surface deep. I don’t mean that he doesn’t care about Tandy, he clearly does, but he seems to be more in love with the idea of her and how he could save her rather than who Tandy actually is

blog.description: Professional cosplayer Margaret "Peggy" Carter, Cheryl Tunt from Archer and Jyn Erso from Rogue One. Please feel free to contact me for events! Upcoming events: OC Con, Jersey Shore Comic Book Show, It's a Toy Show, Garden State Mega Fest, Thy Geekdom Con, Ocean City Comic Con, C3 Cosplay Collectible Con Past Events: Monsters and Robots NJ, Clifton Comic Book Expo, Batman Day, NY Comic Con, Lovecraft After Party featured Cosplayer (NY CC), Witches Ball, The...

summary: It's panel day! Please stop by the Marriott for Agent Carter & Bésame Cosmetics: A Heroic Match! People are already starting to...
caption:
It’s panel day! Please stop by the Marriott for Agent Carter & Bésame Cosmetics: A Heroic Match! People are already starting to line up! Can’t get in, meet us over at Sails at 2pm for photos, autographs and extended Q&A!

Bésame Cosmetics CEO and founder Gabriela Hernandez joins a round-table of Marvel’s Agent Carter fans and experts (Kelly Dreyer, Kristine Knowlton (Carter Cosplay), Peggy Pincurls, comic historian Jessica Tseang, and Sarah Rodriguez (author of Agent Carter Season One: Declassified) to discuss Peggy’s staying power. Panel moderated by Dawn M. Bourn (TheGeek Girl Project). Saturday July 21, 2018 12:00pm – 1:00pm
Grand 1 & 2, Marriott Marquis San Diego Marina
.
.
#besame @besamecosmetics #cartercosplay #agentcarter #agentcartercosplay #hydra #captainamerica #marvel #iknowmyvalue #sdcc #sdcc2018 #sandiegocomiccon

blog.name: dictionarywrites
blog.title: Dictionary Writes
blog.description:
Here in the most grudging manner possible until more people make the sensible choice and come to Dreamwidth instead. This blog is 18+ only: minors don't interact.

Find me on Dreamwidth or Ao3!

summary: The King’s Witch
title: The King’s Witch
body:
WIP. 7k. Stoki. As a child, Steve Rogers was on the very verge of death, sickly and plagued by illness. Healed by a sorcerer named Stephen Strange, but forced to hide his magical improvements due to the outlaw of magic throughout the realm of Libertas, his aim is to become a knight, as his father before him.

Why is it, he wonders, that he cannot tear his gaze away from Loki, the king’s physician? What is it about him, Steve wonders, that chills his very heart?

                                              Ao3 link.

Notes:

Mmm, so this is the other Arthurian Stoki fic. I was gonna do this one for the Big Bang, but I have too much IRL stuff going on to get this finished before August, so I’ll just set it up alongside my other WIPs. It’s a shame, but hey! These things happen, ya know?

Very excited about this universe. It’s interesting to play with a ‘verse where magic is actually something distinctly toxic and dark and dangerous instead of something positive, like I usually write!
